name: Chili Nachos
author: HORMEL CHILI(R)
summary: Kick up the heat when you serve these fantastic nachos.
ingredients: ⅓ cup finely chopped red or white onion
1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Chili With Beans
1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced pitted ripe olives, coarsely chopped  (Optional)
3 cups shredded colby or Monterey Jack cheese
1  fresh jalapeno chile (or more to taste), thinly sliced  (Optional)
directions: In bowl, mix together tomatoes, onion and cilantro
Squeeze lime into the tomato mixture and toss until blended
Arrange a single layer of chips on heatproof platter or baking sheet
Top with spoonfuls of chili, tomato mixture, olives and cheese
Repeat layers until all the ingredients are used
Bake 15 minutes or until cheese is completely melted
